statusHistory.reason: Organization operating in the New World

keyMoments.title: Neo Marines Debut
keyMoments.description: The Neo Marines are introduced as a splinter faction of former Marines led by Z, with Ain and Binz commanding a fleet in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Neo Marines organization that serves as antagonists in the Z's Ambition Arc and One Piece Film Z.

keyMoments.title: Internal Rivalry Revealed
keyMoments.description: Shuzo reveals his ambition to replace Ain as Z's second-in-command, showing internal competition within the organization.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that the Neo Marines have internal conflicts and ambitious members.

ideology.mainGoal: Eliminate all pirates and end the Golden Age of Piracy
ideology.methods: Execute pirates on sight rather than imprisoning them; willing to oppose Marines and World Government
ideology.philosophy: Radical vigilante justice against piracy, believing the Marine's methods are too lenient

resources.ships: Large fleet of warships and submarines
resources.weapons: Standard Marine weapons plus Dyna Stones (revealed later)

keyEvents.description: The Neo Marines are revealed to be a faction founded by former Marine Admiral Z, recruiting other former Marines who share his extreme views on justice.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the origin and nature of the organization.

ship.name: Neo Marine Fleet
ship.description: Multiple warships and submarines bearing the Neo Marine insignia

jollyRoger.description: Neo Marine insignia displayed on their ships and uniforms

trivia: Despite hating pirates, the Neo Marines ironically act like pirates themselves by raising their own flag and opposing the World Government
The organization serves as a tie-in to One Piece Film Z, introducing characters and plot elements that appear in the movie
Their ultimate plan, the 'Grand Reboot,' involves destroying the New World using Dyna Stones
The Neo Marines represent a darker, more extreme vision of justice compared to the regular Marines
